entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 31. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
